This will be an extended version of our WWW 2013 tutorial, tailored specifically towards researchers and practitioners with an information retrieval background. See the other page for more information.

This paper describes our (winning!) submission to the Developers Challenge at WoLE2013, “Doing Good by Linking Entities.” We present a fully automatic system – called “Semantic TED” – which provides intelligent suggestions in the form of links to Wikipedia articles for video streams in multiple languages, based on the subtitles that accompany the visual content.
